title: I love how riot bugsplats me but then i recieve a low priority queue
body: Because my team decides to /remake at the alloted time and i get auto 20 min queue ban. I'm sitting there attempting to reconnect everytime and your trash game  keeps bugsplatting. Thanks garbage Riot.

replies.body: Bugsplat happen when something like bad drivers, data, or hardware is failing to load the game.  The only way to remove the timer is by playing without leaving, so it's important to get that error resolved. Run through the steps in the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to troubleshoot it towards a fix.  I hope it helps.
